group_1.textRight: Wait.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes?

group_1.textRight: We shall assist you.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!

group_1.textRight: No matter how you look at it, this situation is@our fault.

group_1.textLeft: ...Right, Miyu?

group_1.textRight: I-I humbly agree...

group_1.textLeft: Though we cannot fix that girl's physical@condition...
At least let us aid you in your investigation to@atone for our wrongdoings.

group_1.textRight: Please and thank you!

group_1.textLeft: But, I mean...

group_1.textRight: Just this once!

group_1.textLeft: ...A-are you sure...?

group_1.textRight: Do you want to start by asking around@the area?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yes, that would be perfect.

group_1.textRight: La-Lady San...

group_1.textLeft: Don't do anything suspicious, okay, Miyu?

group_1.textRight: O-o-of c-c-course not!

group_1.narration: With the help of those two, particularly San...@We interviewed people from Aobino.
Unfortunately, most of them only knew@the surface of the ghost story problem,@so we couldn't get much useful information.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, let's sort out the information we've@collected so far.

group_1.textRight: In that case...@I suppose I'll start with...
"The locals find ghost stories annoying," for one.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that's definitely true.@I heard that one a lot.

group_1.textRight: They started grumbling about it, and the@hardships it's caused, right off the bat...

group_1.textLeft: But the source of those stories is still...

group_1.textRight: Yes... Quite murky indeed...

group_1.textLeft: There are Aobino youkai legends that it@might've been based on, but...

group_1.textRight: Even the people who knew a little about@that stuff were kinda clueless...
In the end, I suppose there's only one way@to solve the ghost story debacle.
We must eliminate all of this gossip.
It seems our only choice is to put out an@explanation that...
"There is a youkai legend about such-and-such,@which got turned into..." and so forth.

group_1.textLeft: I have a feeling that there are other factors@contributing to the ghost story problem, though.
I don't want to put my blinders on and limit@our options.
But the information we've gathered so far@hasn't given us any clues...

group_1.textRight: We'reâ€• We're still in a bad spot, huh...

group_1.textLeft: To be honest, I feel like we hit a dead end.
Which is why...I'd like to investigate this@from another perspective.

group_1.textRight: Another perspective...@Do you mean...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
A Magical Girl's point of view...

group_1.textRight: The possibility that a Witch is involved...@That's what you're suggesting, isn't it?
That would make sense...

group_1.textLeft: ...Aru-chan...
Go collect up any pieces of information you@can find, no matter how minor...!

group_1.textRight: <Right away, Kagome!>

group_1.textLeft: I'm counting on you...!
